agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Defense & Veterans' Affairs TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess Monday, March 4, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Flynn HB 676 Guillen Relating to the entitlement of spouses of certain veterans with disabilities to a veteran's employment preference. HB 833 Hernandez Relating to the creation of a statewide alert system for missing military members. HB 306 Herrero Relating to the creation of an open burn pit registry for certain service members and veterans. HB 696 Blanco Relating to employment and referral services for veterans and military service members. HB 620 Neave Relating to a women veterans suicide prevention public awareness campaign. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
